overview: Sheryl Crow treks across the country for this smash 2003 tour, proving once again that she's not only a master of the recording studio and music videos, but of live performance as well. With this video featuring 13 chart-toppers, including "All I Wanna Do" and "Everyday Is a Winding Road," Crow continues to entertain in her hard-driving, uncompromising and indefatigable style.
title: Sheryl Crow: C'mon America
